ing: 8 frozen blueberries, or more to taste
1 1/2 teaspoons apple cider vinegar, or more to taste
1/2 teaspoon ground ginger, or to taste
des: "Had the inspiration to make something similar to the real thing but at a fraction of the cost. Tastes identical!"
ins: Place blueberries in a cup. Add apple cider vinegar, lemon juice, and ginger. Pour in seltzer water; stir a few times. Stir in ice.
